snippet: An accumulation of run-ins with other company leaders led to Steven Sinofsky’s departure, according to several current and former Microsoft executives.
abstract: Steven Sinofsky's abrasive management style and run-ins with current and former Microsoft executives is said to have contributed to his sudden departure from the company as head of Windows, despite his reputation as a brilliant leader.
lead_paragraph: An accumulation of run-ins with other company leaders led to Steven Sinofsky’s departure, according to several current and former Microsoft executives.

headline.seo: At Microsoft, Sinofsky Seen as Smart but Abrasive
headline.main: Ex-Windows Chief Seen as Smart but Abrasive
headline.print_headline: Ex-Windows Chief Seen as Smart but Abrasive
